txt.en: Without the necessary equipment, the Orcs of Dursh Hûl cannot hold out for long. Perhaps now the Haban'akkâ will have the chance to ascend the mountain.
Dursh Hûl occupies a strategic position, blocking the path to Tharkh Shathur. Destroying the Orcs' armour and weapons will weaken the forces here.
Destroying the Orcs' armour and weapons at Dursh Hûl will weaken the forces here.
Dursh Hûl occupies a strategic position, blocking the path to Tharkh Shathur.
Destroying the Orcs' armour and weapons at Dursh Hûl will weaken the forces here.
You have sabotaged as much of the Orcs' equipment as you could find.
Destroying the Orcs' equipment could weaken their hold on Dursh Hûl
Destroy Orkish armour and weapons at Dursh Hûl
